messages.author: James Hawkins
messages.text: Remove this DCHECK. In general, DCHECK at most once on internal member vars (at time of creation).

messages.author: James Hawkins
messages.text: You could pull these two lines out of the loop, but why are we setting the default favicon at first?  Won't this be janky if the user sees default favicon, then the actual favicon once the service sends the icons?

messages.author: James Hawkins
messages.text: Save indentation and return early on the negation of the logic statement.

messages.author: James Hawkins
messages.text: Under what circumstances is |delegate_| allowed to be NULL?

messages.author: James Hawkins
messages.text: Order of methods in the implementation file needs to match the order in the header.

messages.author: James Hawkins
messages.text: afaik, you don't need to call Destroy on an OwnedWidgetGtk in the destructor (it happens at scope).

messages.author: binji
messages.text:
